documents.document: School are handing out marketing materials via my son now. Joy. https://t.co/dHCkQRmYYs
@madlinsudn It's a nice summary - a couple of things I'd seen, but a whole load I'd not. Also, the spiral stairs...!
@dansmythphoto Makes sense... I know of a charity who abandoned an outdoor contactless thing because of power issues. Solar is interesting!
@dansmythphoto @JamesBarker82 Have they got contactless and non-contactless versions then? (Info: https://t.co/FMACgCVkab)
@JamesBarker82 I was just reading about this. They have contactless donation things on, apparently. Not sure about "powered" bit either.
If you don't, you should subscribe to @madlinsudn's email about digital content and stuff. It's good. Latest one; https://t.co/VUi1ucYAK2

I mean, the house is wrong, but it'll be fun to debate.
